page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content: My name is Helen Ovens.I live near a little village called Talybont in a rural area.It is quite a peaceful place except for the noise of the birds,animals and insects.Around the village are scattered houses and farms,green fields and narrow,twisting roads with tall hedges,long grass and wild flowers on either side.The air here is a lot cleaner and fresher than in the towns and cities.One of the reasons is because a lot of people have wood fires instead of coal fires and wood does not give off a sooty smell.There are many small woods and forests here in the countryside,some are old Oak woods and others are Larch,planted by the Forestry Commision and farmers. In and between the fields and woods are lots of streams,coming down from the hills.
